channel.title: MoparScaped Coding Help Chat Group
channel.description:
Unable to find coding help the second you need it on the forums? Join our Xat chat group and ask some of our staff members any questions you may have about RSPS coding. Our staff members would be glad to help you with any problems you may have.
If you would like to help out the chat by joining, then please post about it here. If you prove to be a help to people across the chat, then you will be given a staff spot.
The chat group can be found [url=http://xat.com/moparscape_server_help]here[/url]. Thank you for joining us at the chat. :)

item.title: MoparScaped Coding Help Chat Group
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

We already have an IRC channel for help. We do not need you.

Read full topic
